overview.title: Ultra High-Performance
overview.text:
Next-generation, super-powerful 16nm processor and flagship FinFET Plus technology togive you lightning speed.
Leading-edge octa-core chips provide a 65% performance boost and 40% cut in power consumption.
Seamless gaming with 100% increase in GPU performance compared to Kirin 620.
Ultra-smooth user experience thanks to brand-new EMUI 4.1 operating system.

overview.title: Stunning Selfies
overview.text:
Unrivalled 8 MP Sony/Hynix front camera for sensational selfies.
Rapid capture and preview speeds along with automatic scene recognition and ten beauty modes.
13 MP rear camera with 5P macro lens for crystal-clear shots every time.

overview.title: Powerful Battery
overview.text:
Compact battery design that packs a powerful punch, with huge 3,000 mAh capacity.
Enjoy extended heavy use thanks to power-saving technology, doze mode and more.
Super-efficient chipset and processing cut power consumption by an incredible 40%.

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio codecs: APE，AAC，AAC+ , FLAC, OGG, ADPCM

specification.title: Video
text: Video file formats: H.263, H.264, MPEG-4
